::Rixer/Blyer/EndBringer/Prowl::

Rixer dives under the missiles, rolling back to his feet and firing
two back at Imprisoner.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Blyer dives after Firestarter, firing 20 rapid laser shots at the
bot's cockpit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer laughs, turning and putting Double Punch in the way of the
shots as he continued to leave the proximity of battle. A missile
launches from his shoulder and heads toward Beeline as he continues to
pump electricity through Double Punch, his tentacles beginning to
tighten around the bot to try to crush him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl's mind felt another bot approaching him, and he made a mental
note to watch out for that bot as well.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (The movements of the Oblitercons, Nemesis Enforcer, and Scattershot
will be 
> in a seperate e-mail since they are halfway to the Alliance Island
and have 
> nothing to do with the Battle at South Africa.  I may have missed
some 
> people's resposnes, got a lot of e-mails.  Tell me if I missed any. 
And Jen, 
> I have no Predacon characters.)
> 
> The Protectobots/Dark
Wolf/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/ 
> Firestarter/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun
Crusher/Reflector/ 
> Sixshot/Ares:
> 
> 
> Over all, (all of my non-Maximal characters) had pulled out from the
battle 
> enough so they are out of firing range of the CF.
> 
> Quite a few number of blasts shot out, twenty-five ripping at Dark
Wolf's 
> armor.  He wasn't hurt to bad from the realatively weak blasts, but
they were 
> chipping away, and doing damage and eventually they would be quite
hinderful.
> 
> He fired three fire balls from his mouth, one at Shivah, one at
Wespah, and 
> one at Element (g).
> 
> Raising his free hand, a black sphere of destructive energy formed
and shot 
> out with the power of two missiles at the Element (starship).
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot was slowly but surely bein repaired by the near stasis
locked First 
> Aid.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades avoided the fire ball and fired off twenty-five highly
explosive 
> shells at Darkfate, being struck by six of Darkfate's blast and
crashing into 
> the ground.
> 
> ---
> 
> Imprisoner avoided most of the shots except for a dozen rapid ones
that dug 
> into already damaged areas and hurt non-essential computer
components.
> 
> He fired off a total of four missiles, two from two cannons.  Two at
the 
> Element (starship), and two at Rixer.
> 
> ---
> 
> He leapt out of the way of most of the blasts, some shrapnel digging
into his 
> right forearm.  "Slaggers." Predator raised his launcher, firing off
two 
> missiles at the Element (starship).
> 
> ---
> 
> Choran rolled out of the way of most of the shots, a plasma bolt
grazing his 
> neck.  He raised his own rifle, firing in an arc.  Five laser blasts
at 
> Wespah, five at Darkfate, and fifteen at Element (gestalt).
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave easily spotted Truttle looking in his direction and flew
hard right 
> before he event had his weapons aimed, flying out of the way of all
the shots 
> coming towards him, avoiding the missiles as well.  He raised his
left arm, 
> the barrel at the end of the hand spouting out three laser beams at
Truttle.  
> He raised the other arm, firing off two rockets from the missile
launcher at 
> the Element (starship).
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron flew out of the way of most shots, blocking the others with
his ever 
> weakening arm-shield.  He raised his rifle, firing off four bolts. 
Two at 
> Dollon and two at Drillbit.
> 
> "Surrender weak Predacons, you inferior beings cannot defeat a
Decepticon, 
> even if there were five of you."
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter avoided the missiles easily, powering up his engines
even more 
> blasting away from Blyer, being too high up to be affected by
shrapnel.
> 
> He fired off a pair of rockets at the Element (starship), and
changed his 
> position, firing off twenty-five rapid laser blasts from his
nosecone weapon 
> at Element (gestalt)'s torso.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch still felt the electricity flow through him as systems
began 
> shutting down.
> 
> Beeline the cyberbee fired off another twenty-five rapid laser
bolts, this 
> time at EndBringer's neck and face, at an angle that would send the
laser 
> bolts in a direction that would make it so they wouldn't hit Double
Punch at 
> all.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector avoided most of the shots fired at him some digging into
his legs 
> painfully.  Raising both stinger missile launchers.  He fired off
two from 
> each.  All four headed for the Element (starship).  He especially
avoided the 
> vines not only because he was in constant movement but because he is
over 300 
> feet in the air.  (Nice try Yan)
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror barely managed to avoid all the shots fired at him, firing
off two 
> ion disks from each arm.  All four heading for the abdomen of
Element 
> (gestalt).
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement avoided all the shots fired at him except Darkfate's shots,
several 
> of them digging into his right arm that he blocked them with. 
"Heathens..." 
> he cursed through a gritted mouth.  He raised both arms, firing a
missile 
> from each.  Both heading for the Element (gestalt).
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher avoided all the things fired at him except a few plasma
blasts 
> from the Element that dug into his knee.  He cursed as he saw a
small crack.  
> He raised his arms, firinga missile from each.  Two in total heading
for the 
> Element.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector avoided most of the shots, several deepening an already
bad wound.  
> He cursed painfully, no longer able to hide it.  He raised both
arms, two 
> missiles, one from a single tube each.  Both missiles streaked out
for the 
> Element.  The other two tubes launched a sphere of plasma energy.
> 
> Two plasma spheres streaked out towards Element's (gestalt) left
shoulder.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sixshot easily avoided the missiles, not even bothering tracking
them as they 
> plummeted and exploded agains the ground, only deepening old
craters.
> 
> He armed his weapons, firing off two missiles at the Element
(starship), and 
> five rapid laser bolts at Element's (getsalt) left foot.
> 
> ---
> 
> Ares avoided everything except some missile shrapnel which dug into
his wings 
> but were realitively harmless.  He armed his weapons and fired off
two 
> missiles at the Element (starship), and got into a position to fire
ten rapid 
> laser bolts off at Prowl (if he's still at the battle).
